entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:41 p.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
